name: Stack and Snakes
description:
A small stacking game where you have to beat an AI!

Gameplay:

Stacks and Snakes is a stack game where you have to try to place the wooden blocks as precisely as possible to in cries the speed multiplier. But be careful with the Snakes if you hit them the game is over!

For this game I used Blender for the 3d Asset and Unreal engine 4 to build the Game on.
